website_summaries.verdict: This comprehensive legendary Pokémon themed Elite Trainer Box contains everything a novice Pokémon fan needs to play this trading card game.
pros: Includes 8 Cosmic Eclipse booster packs, 65 stylish card sleeves, 45 energy cards, player’s guide, and other pieces to start playing the TCG
Spacious collector’s storage box with 4 dividers
cons: Themed around Palkia, Dialgia, and Arceus, but there is no guarantee you will find their cards in this box

customer_reviews.title: Tampered Product
customer_reviews.text: The packs received were resealed. I noticed a tough smell and when I opened the pack the borders stuck. Packs do not use glue at the factory for sealing. There are various videos online showing this. Be careful and if a pack doesn't open easy or it is stuck/hard to open and breaks when opening on the borders or has a glue smell it's a tampered pack. Hope the photo can help you in some shape or form by noticing on the border seems.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: For sale: resealed packs for a new set
customer_reviews.text: I was looking foreword to a new set but all you’ll get from this box is some non-rare reverse holos. It’s quite obvious that someone already opened these up and resealed them with a lousy glue job afterwards. The cards were also upside down inside their wrappings as well. I would recommend that you purchase this box somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Honest rick

customer_reviews.title: trrrrrrrrraaaaaaaassssssssssshhhhhhhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: this does not even deserve 1 star all of the rares were regular rares worst pokemon product i have ever opened please do not buy this elite trainer box a.k.a dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: John Huber

customer_reviews.title: Worst cards I've ever gotten from an elite trainer box.
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as discribed but the cards I got are the worst I've ever seen for an ETB and this is my 5th ETB. Just a heads up for those looking to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy Pokémon cards from amazon.  They are rigged.
customer_reviews.text: I only got 1 gx. It wasn’t even a tag team card. No other cards were rare at all. This is suspicious. I didn’t get any secret rare cards either. The only decent pull was a Volcanra gx
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Came sealed with plastic around box. Came on time.
customer_reviews.text: No idea what these other people are talking about. My package was not messed with my cards were never opened besides by me and you can see all my pulls. They must have been upset with there pulls is all i can gather. Hope this was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Squinge

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Good Pulls
customer_reviews.text: What other reviewer are saying isn't true in the slightest for me. I'd say about half the packs had good cards in them from what I pulled. I got 3 Gxs (1 was alternate art worth $20-$30) and on top of that I got 2 trainer and pokemon full arts (ex: Wishiwashi and Mallow card). No complaints here.Also I have no idea what the other review is talking about glued packs. Certainly didnt happen to me.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Not tampered with.
customer_reviews.text: To put the rumors to rest, they're NOT tampered with. Bought one from Walmart, one from Amazon. I waited for the Amazon package and they were obviously identical. Gx in the Walmart but from Amazon package I got gx and character cards secret rares. It's random, folks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Resealed packs
customer_reviews.text: Box looks new to anyone but is sadly resealed. The packs very clearly tampered with have glue residue and you could see the part of the pack where it's been opened. Didn't get any GX or higher in rarity. Buy if you want to be scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Tampered product.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product, the booster packs had been opened and resealed using some sort of adhesive. Returned it immediately since I figured the contents of the pack had been tampered.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas and it unfortunately disappointed. He only pulled 1 tag team full art card from the whole lot (8 packs). It ended up being somewhat of a waste of money since he already had over 90% of the cards already. The sleeves were possibly the thing that saved the purchase since he enjoys collecting them
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Brand new ETB! NOT REPACKAGED
customer_reviews.text: Only had two good pulls but I was just happy I wasn’t one of the few that got a repackaged ETB Good thing about amazon is their customer service so just try your luck and if you get an opened box just return! Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: TRUSTWORTHY, but POOR CONDITION
customer_reviews.text: Before you read, I don’t think this box was resealed. Although I didn’t pull anything exceptional, it seemed balanced enough to be considered trustworthy. I really like the aesthetic of the Cosmic Eclipse set, but I am very disappointed of the state this trainer box came in. The deck box is crushed in all of the corners, even though its not a heavy item by any means. Didn’t pull much out of the 8 boosters. The only two notable cards were the Steelix Secret Rare and a Togepi/Cleffa/Igglybuff Tag Team GX.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Ross

customer_reviews.title: The seller that I purchased from resealed the packs, could see glue at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Resealed packs, the wrapper on the outside was not the same plastic used on normal boxes. When looking at the packs, you can see the extra glue they used to reseal the pack. Statistically the pull rates for these boxes are 2.5 ultra rares or better, and there were 0 packs with rares, as well as the fact that one of my packs came with 4 energies in it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander C.

customer_reviews.title: Tampered with. What garbage.
customer_reviews.text: All resealed packs with terrible obvious glue on the edges of the packages. NO good pulls whatsoever. What kind of garbage people tamper with kids collectible toys/hobbies?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Super fair and no issues
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter and I wanted. She got a pretty good draw. Mine was amazing. No tampering. I always look it over intensely before I open and it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Nicole Enox

customer_reviews.title: The Cards Were Opened and Resealed!
customer_reviews.text: We received this box today and every single package had been opened and re-sealed! So they obviously took out the good cards and left the junk. There was not a single good card in this box. My son wanted the cards right away and didn't have patience to wait for me to send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Tiania

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pokémon cards and this came in the perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good pulls
customer_reviews.text: Got some pretty good pulls! We loved it! Make sure to buy directly from Amazon though or you could get a tampered with box.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Unboxing on YouTube
customer_reviews.text: Awesome trainer box. I unbox it on YouTube on my channel PokemonASMR
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my nephew and it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this for Christmas. There are lots of cards to sort through so if you’re looking for a gift that they’ll be excited about and keep them entertained this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what my grandson wanted. Price/package very acceptable. Delivery very timely. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Colemere

customer_reviews.title: tampered with item
customer_reviews.text: The item was tampered with, all of the booster packs had been resealed and had a obvious added glue residue on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason owens

customer_reviews.title: Quality product-speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: This set was the perfect gift for my 7-year-old Grandson Pokemon fan. I know absolutely nothing about this game, but it was a big hit with him!
customer_reviews.author: BSimmonsRVA

customer_reviews.title: A fresh experience in Pokémon.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect example as to how Pokémon maintains a fresh appeal. A great expansion
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Andriani

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent box pulled two tag team Pokémon and one tag team trainer would suggest for a starter
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! I pulled a full art Galade, a oricorio gx and, sogalaio and lunala tag team gx.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: CE ETB
customer_reviews.text: Box came clean and sealed. And no damage from poor storage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great boxed pokemon card set. Comes with 8 booster packs.
customer_reviews.author: Majin Buu

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Cost for Collectors and Players
customer_reviews.text: Setting aside the random element found in cards, the included dice, storage box, box dividers, and status markers are high-quality. The sleeve backs can fall off after enough wear and tear, though. Whether you play or collect, you're bound to find something useful.
customer_reviews.author: Spectrobits

customer_reviews.title: SCAM! DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: SCAM ALERT! Every single individual card packet inside this trainer box was already OPEN when we received it! And the cards had clearly been picked through!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pokemon TCG: Sun & Moon—Cosmic Eclipse Elite Trainer Box
product_meta.description: At the apex of the sun & moon series, the Pokémon TCG: Sun & moon—cosmic eclipse expansion boosts the connection of Pokémon and trainers, and it launches tag team combinations to new levels! Start your collection of this exciting expansion with the sun & moon—cosmic eclipse elite trainer box. This collector's box contains all sorts of goodies that both collectors and players will appreciate. In addition to eight sun & moon—cosmic eclipse booster packs and loads of energy cards, The set contains 65 card sleeves featuring the tag team trio of Arceus, dialga, and palkia. Accessories like dice and acrylic game markers will have you playing in style. There's even a player's guide filled with useful strategies and a card list. Prepare for a battle of cosmic proportions with the Pokémon TCG: Sun & moon—cosmic eclipse elite trainer box!
feature_bullets: 8 Pokémon TCG:  Sun & moon—cosmic eclipse booster packs
65 card sleeves featuring Arceus & Dialga & Palkia
A player's guide to the sun & moon—cosmic eclipse expansion

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars362 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
